result.execSummary:
David R Geocaris was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means David R Geocaris was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Attorney Emily Trigg appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Brenda VanCuick.  Clerk: PT
DE waives extradition and elects to return to Lake County, IL and signs waiver of extradition.  Court grants extradition and signs order
Attorney Emily Trigg appeared for the State.  Def. appeared (in custody) with Atty Brenda VanCuick.  Clerk K. Zirbel.  Case to trail 13CF881 and 15CF647 on 4/13/16 at 2:00.  Bond continued.

Attorney Emily Trigg appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Brenda VanCuick.  Clerk:PT
Case continues to trail 13CF881.
Stipulation and Order for Substitution of Counsel

Attorney Emily Trigg appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney D Henderson.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Trails 13CF881 to 2/25/16 at 1pm and 2/29/16 at 8:30am.  Bond continued.

Attorney Emily Trigg appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Douglas Henderson.  Clerk: PT
Atty Henderson states DE wants new counsel.   DE requests he be allowed 2 weeks to retain his own attorney.  Court holds motion for withdraw of counsel in abeyance at this time.  Status conference scheduled for November 10, 2015 at 10:40 am.

15CF645/15CF647/13CF881/15TR9358/15TR9359
Attorney Emily Trigg appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Douglas Henderson.  Clerk: PT
Atty Henderson appears along with Atty Brenda VanCuick.  Atty Henderson states he has been appointed to represent DE in 15CF645 and 15CF647 and also agrees to represent DE is 13CF881 in place of Atty VanCuick.  Atty Henderson requests the trial scheduled in 13CF881 be removed from the courts calendar at this time and a status date be set on all files.  Upon hearing statements court grants request.  Status conference scheduled for all files on October 28, 2015 at 10:30 am.

NO RECORD TAKEN:  Attorney Thomas Binger appeared specially for Atty Trigg and for the State.  Atty Douglas Henderson appeared.  Clerk: PT
Parties met in chambers and a request to adjourn today's hearing was granted by the court off the record.  Status Conf. on 9/16/15 at 10:10 AM.
Extradition hearing on August 6, 2015 at 09:30 am.
